ProcessTemplates.Name: CSV file from SFTP server to MySQL Database Insert
ProcessTemplates.Description: This Process read the contents of a CSV file from an SFTP server and converts them to JSON before creating and executing an INSERT statement to a MySQL database.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"FileName":{"Value":"\"my-data.csv\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the file to be read from the SFTP server."},"FilePath":{"Value":"\"/myFolder/mySubFolder/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Directory for files stored on SFTP server."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"192.0.2.0\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server address."},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"myUsername\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"myPassword\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user's password."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"myTable\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the database table."},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;Uid=myUsername;Pwd=myPassword;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Connection string to access the database."}}
